mapper.select: SELECT TF.F_FDCODE, TF.E_EVTCODE, TE.E_NTTILTE, TE.E_STARTDATE, TE.E_ENDDATE, SYSDATE AS TODAY, TF.FC_1ST, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TFC.FC_2ND = 0 AND TFC.FC_3RD = 0) AS FCNAME_1ST, TF.FC_2ND, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TFC.FC_3RD = 0) AS FCNAME_2ND, TF.FC_3RD, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TF.FC_3RD = TFC.FC_3RD) AS FCNAME_3RD, (SELECT TFC.FC_ISBLOCK FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TF.FC_3RD = TFC.FC_3RD) AS FC_ISBLOCK, TF.F_FOODNAME, TF.F_PRICE, TF.F_EXPLAN, TF.F_IMGNAME, TF.F_THUMNAME, TF.F_ISBLOCK, TF.MS_CODE FROM TR_FOOD TF LEFT OUTER JOIN TR_EVENT TE ON TF.E_EVTCODE = TE.E_EVTCODE

SELECT TF.F_FDCODE, TF.E_EVTCODE, TE.E_NTTILTE, TE.E_STARTDATE, TE.E_ENDDATE, SYSDATE AS TODAY, TF.FC_1ST, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TFC.FC_2ND = 0 AND TFC.FC_3RD = 0) AS FCNAME_1ST, TF.FC_2ND, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TFC.FC_3RD = 0) AS FCNAME_2ND, TF.FC_3RD, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TF.FC_3RD = TFC.FC_3RD) AS FCNAME_3RD, (SELECT TFC.FC_ISBLOCK FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TF.FC_3RD = TFC.FC_3RD) AS FC_ISBLOCK, TF.F_FOODNAME, TF.F_PRICE, TF.F_EXPLAN, TF.F_IMGNAME, TF.F_THUMNAME, TF.F_ISBLOCK, TF.MS_CODE FROM TR_FOOD TF LEFT OUTER JOIN TR_EVENT TE ON TF.E_EVTCODE = TE.E_EVTCODE WHERE TF.F_FDCODE = #{f_fdcode}
